name: Draw-Pattern-Bada-Soch-Submission
description:
This game based on "Bada Soch"  theme.

Hello gamers, do you want to Draw Pattern but not by Draw Line by number then play it...

In that Use any 2 dot between 1 to 9 

Function name :- Ex. Drawline(2,6)

For change color of line and dot

For line :- Ex. Linecolor=#f3f3f3

For Dot :- Ex. Dotcolor=#f3f3f3

For check whether pattern match or not :-

Check_for_win 

and also read rules properly

hope you will be enjoy!!!
